channel.title: My ventures into Mixing
channel.description:
Just started mixing some songs together and wanted to share + get some opinions from people :)
Here are a few of my vaguely good ones (in my opinion) that I've mashed together https://soundcloud.com/shalomgoyem/blurred-lines-house-mix-daft https://soundcloud.com/shalomgoyem/fat-jon-outcast-mash
Rate/Hate/Masturbate!

item.title: My ventures into Mixing
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Or you could post in the right board u terrible terrible man. But yeah not bad, I suppose it’s just practice makes perfect more than anything else.

Read full topic

item.title: My ventures into Mixing
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Your beats are a constant volume compared to the volume of the music.

Read full topic

item.title: My ventures into Mixing
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I found the songs to be a bit too similar to the original. I might be mistaken but it sounded like beats on top of the originals? I do recommend trying various things other than just beats, it will sound 100x better. I don’t know. I don’t mix music myself but I do very much enjoy listening to all kinds.

Read full topic
